title: Webhooks
lede: Configure real-time event notifications to external systems and applications.

sections.title: Webhook Configuration
sections.content:
Set up webhooks to receive real-time notifications about events in your iMash account.

Event Types:

  • Call Events: Call started, ended, transferred
  • Campaign Events: Campaign started, paused, completed
  • CRM Events: New leads, contact updates
  • Agent Events: Agent status changes

sections.title: Webhook Management
sections.content:
Manage and monitor your webhook endpoints.

  • Endpoint Configuration: URL, headers, authentication
  • Event Filtering: Subscribe to specific events only
  • Retry Logic: Automatic retry on failed deliveries
  • Delivery Logs: Track webhook delivery status
